Question: The trio played publicly for the first time on July 17 at the Bon Air club—this person still sporting his child-size guitar.
Hints: Three new, non-movie this person studio albums were released in 1971, as many as had come out over the previous eight years.
Allen's show with this person had, for the first time, beaten CBS's Ed Sullivan Show in the ratings.
Though the rumored remark was wholly discredited at the time, it was still being used against this person decades later.
